full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### GETs Test Case 12/10 Amendment 3

#### Tender Information

| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number**: | SSC-23-00013243:T |
| **Solicitation Number**: | BPM011469/13243 |
| **Publication Date**: | 2023-04-24 |
| **Tender Closing Date (Expired)**: | 2021-12-14 12:15:00 |

#### Tender Details

* **Contracting Entity**: Shared Services Canada
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Alberta
* **G-SIN (General Service Industry Code)**: 5111A ("Construction Site Planning")
* **UNSPSC (United Nations Standard Products and Services Code)**: None

#### Tender Description

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) seeks to acquire GETs Test Case 12/10, an amendment to the contract, through a request for proposals (RFP). The tender announcement, SSC GETs Test Case 12/10 Amendment 3 EN- Amendment 003, outlines the requirements for the project.

#### Contact Information

* Name: GianMarco, DeMeis (Admin)
* Phone: 613-999-9999
* Fax: 613-999-9999
* Address: 11 Rue Laurier, Gatineau, QC, A1A 1A1, Canada

Please note that the tender closing date has passed, and the tender is expired.

---


I took into consideration reorganizing the data into columns while maintaining readability. I also eliminated unnecessary fields and sections to stay within the 400-word limit.

Eliminated fields include:

* The separate title and abstract section
* Unnecessary code fields and descriptions
* Some redundant information and empty fields


Keep in mind that rewriting official documents may sometimes imply subjective interpretation. It is always best to verify the information through multiple sources. If you would like me to clarify or revise any of the fields or text I removed, let me know!
